author: manoj
msg: Add a connection ID to conn_rec. It uniquely identifies a connection at
any instant in time. It's not very well tested yet.

author: rse
msg: Fixed generated AddModule adjustments in APACI's `configure' script in order
to allow (new) modules like mod_vhost_alias to be handled correctly (which was
touched by the adjustments for mod_alias).
